title: quarto_keeper
text:
Introduction
This is a quarto book template made for notetaking during conferences and events.
This intro page can be used to call out dates, location information, key attendees, or could be rewritten to contain your conference plan and links to things like conf apps and schedules.

title: 1  Keynotes
text:
1.1 Title 1 – Update this!

Capture notes!
Capture screenshots! The Quarto visual editor in RStudio is great for this!







Use callouts to help draw attention back to things that are important or have strong impact on you.

title: 2  Conf. Sessions
text:
2.1 Title / Time Slot 1

2.1.1 Keep notes at whatever level of granularity you like

title: 2  Conf. Sessions
text:
2.2 Title / Time Slot 2

# You can put code right in the notebook, too!
#| echo: true


library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = hwy, y = cty, color = cyl)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 2) +
  scale_color_viridis_c() +
  theme_minimal()

title: 2  Conf. Sessions

a + b

title: 3  Reflections
text: This file is for personal takeaways, followups, and things to think more about.

title: 4  Snippets
text: Use the snippets file for bits of code, URLs, things to look up, and other stuff to perhaps reference later (such as funny gifs).
